oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Back Courts at James A. Cayce Homes, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the back courts of the James A. Cayce Homes showing clothes line supports.. The Cayce Homes (Project Tenn. 5-1) were built between 1939 and 1941 as a white-oly community, designed by Marr & Holman. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, not dated. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
